entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 14. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
